name: Soul Dilemma
description:
Hi friend… I have bad news… You have been cursed by a demon! Now you are a monster that needs to absorb souls during the night in order try to postpone your horrible fait of being send to hell…

I wish you the best of lucks, as the demon king will always ask for more and more souls… That bastard!

Be careful with the villagers, they are smarter than you think as after you attack their homes they will reinforce them, put on alarms and hire more guards that won’t hesitate to kill you if they see you. Be careful!

Ahh also remember that you need to finish the collection of the souls before daytime, so keep an eye on the clock!
